<<pre class="ocsforge_color odocwiki_code"|<<span id="TYPEtraversable"|<<span class="ocsforge_color_keyword"|class type>> <<span class="ocsforge_color_name"|traversable>>>> <<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"|~=>> <<span class="ocsforge_color_keyword"|object>><<a_api subproject="client" text=".." | class type Ow_traversable.traversable >><<span class="ocsforge_color_keyword"|end>>>>~A <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|traversable>> element can use keys to navigate through their
      children ~(only one level of children~)~.


      ~The element **~M~U~S~T ~B~E** a **ul** with **li** children~.


      **li** elements are used as container for child and used as item
      for the <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|traversable>> element~. ~They must respect some requirements~.
      ~They **~M~U~S~T ~H~A~V~E** the css class **"ojw~_traversable~_elt"**~.


      ~Traversable is used to compose other widgets ~(as <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~Ow~_dropdown>>~)~.
**~Inherits**
* <<a_api subproject="client" | class Ow_base_widget.widget >>~Get the original version of the container used as <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|traversable>>
        element ~(without conversion~)~.
